channel.title: Uh... poop? (HELP!)

item.title: Uh... poop? (HELP!)
item.dc:creator: @Zaroyn Zaroyn
item.description:
@Zaroyn wrote:

okay… i tried adding a full gilded bonus to my server… but it didnt work. I posted the main problem below.

^ client.java:24796: ';' expected if(FullGildedEquipped()) ^ client.java:24797: <identifier> expected MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.9014); ^ client.java:24797: <identifier> expected MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.9014); ^ 100 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

The last things i added where

} if(FullGildedEquipped()) MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.9014);

And

} public boolean FullGildedEquipped() { if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1040 &&playerEquipment[playerChest] == 3481 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 3483) { return true; } return false;

Help PLEASE!!!

Come on! someone has to know what is wrong!!

Read full topic
